snippet: Former lawyers for Maj. Nidal Malik Hasan, who has admitted being the gunman in the 2009 rampage, said that helping him achieve his death-sentence goal violates their ethics as defense lawyers.
abstract: Col Tara A Osborn, judge overseeing military trial of Maj Nidal Malik Hasan, denies his former lawyers' request to limit their role in the case; ruling comes day after lawyers said helping Hasan achieve his death-sentence goal violates their ethics as defense lawyers.
lead_paragraph: Former lawyers for Maj. Nidal Malik Hasan, who has admitted being the gunman in the 2009 rampage, said that helping him achieve his death-sentence goal violates their ethics as defense lawyers.

headline.main: Judge Denies Ex-Defense Team’s Bid to Limit Role in Fort Hood Suspect’s Trial
headline.print_headline: Judge Denies Ex-Defense Team’s Bid to Limit Role in Fort Hood Suspect’s Trial
